summary:
Google Chrome is a popular web browser made by Google. It was first made for Windows in 2008 and later for other systems like Linux, macOS, iOS, and Android. Chrome is based on a project called Chromium and uses a special engine called Blink to show web pages.

As of April 2024, Chrome is the most used browser in the world, with about 65% of the market share on computers and smartphones. Its success helped Google create other "Chrome" products like ChromeOS, Chromecast, and Chromebook.
title: Google Chrome
